mapper.update: update d_drugkind set drugkindid=drugkindid ,drugkindcode=#{drugkindcode} ,drugkindname=#{drugkindname} ,measunit=#{measunit} ,description=#{description} ,remark=#{remark} where drugkindid=#{drugkindid}

update d_drugkind set drugkindid=drugkindid ,drugkindcode=#{drugkindcode} ,drugkindname=#{drugkindname} ,measunit=#{measunit} ,description=#{description} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,remark=#{remark} where 1=1 and drugkindid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and drugkindid =#{Where_Id} and drugkindid=#{Where_drugkindid} and drugkindcode=#{Where_drugkindcode} and drugkindname=#{Where_drugkindname} and measunit=#{Where_measunit} and description=#{Where_description} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.drugkindcode "drugkindcode", t.drugkindname "drugkindname", t.measunit "measunit", t.description "description", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from d_drugkind t where drugkindid=#{drugkindid}

select t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.drugkindcode "drugkindcode", t.drugkindname "drugkindname", t.measunit "measunit", t.description "description", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from d_drugkind t where 1=1 and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.drugkindcode=#{drugkindcode} and t.drugkindname=#{drugkindname} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.description=#{description} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}

select t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.drugkindcode "drugkindcode", t.drugkindname "drugkindname", t.measunit "measunit", t.description "description", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from d_drugkind t where 1=1 and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.drugkindcode=#{drugkindcode} and t.drugkindname=#{drugkindname} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.description=#{description} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}
mapper.delete: delete from d_drugkind where 1=1 and drugkindid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and drugkindid =#{Where_Id} and drugkindid=#{Where_drugkindid} and drugkindcode=#{Where_drugkindcode} and drugkindname=#{Where_drugkindname} and measunit=#{Where_measunit} and description=#{Where_description} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.drugkindid "drugkindid", t.drugkindcode "drugkindcode", t.drugkindname "drugkindname", t.measunit "measunit", t.description "description", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.remark "remark" from d_drugkind t where 1=1 and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.drugkindcode=#{drugkindcode} and t.drugkindname=#{drugkindname} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.description=#{description} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}

select count(*) from d_drugkind t where 1=1 and t.drugkindid=#{drugkindid} and t.drugkindid!=#{NoId} and t.drugkindcode=#{drugkindcode} and t.drugkindname=#{drugkindname} and t.measunit=#{measunit} and t.description=#{description} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.remark=#{remark}
